content: Beware of more Overseeing Monks as you ascend, and try to stay patient using thrust attacks from out of their range to conserve your health from getting hit by their martial arts counters.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
Beware of more Overseeing Monks as you ascend, and try to stay patient using thrust attacks from out of their range to conserve your health from getting hit by their martial arts counters.
